mapper.select: SELECT AA.FISH_INFO_ID AS FISH_INFO_ID , FI.FISH_NAME AS FISH_NAME , AA.FARM_TYPES AS FARM_TYPES , FI.YIELD AS FISH_YIELD , FI.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL FROM FISH_INFO FI , (SELECT A.FISH_INFO_ID , GROUP_CONCAT(A.FARM_TYPE) AS FARM_TYPES FROM (SELECT FI.FISH_INFO_ID , FARM_TYPE FROM FISH_MARKET_PRICE FMP , FISH_SALE_AREA FSA , FISH_SALE_INFO FSI , FISH_INFO FI WHERE FMP.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID = FSA.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID AND FSA.ZONE_NAME = '노량진' AND DATE(FMP.SALE_DTM) = DATE('2022-06-19') AND FMP.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID = FSI.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID AND FSI.FISH_INFO_ID = FI.FISH_INFO_ID GROUP BY FI.FISH_INFO_ID, FSI.FARM_TYPE) A GROUP BY A.FISH_INFO_ID) AA WHERE FI.FISH_INFO_ID = AA.FISH_INFO_ID

SELECT FI.FISH_NAME AS FISH_NAME , FSI.FISHERY_AREA AS FISHERY_AREA , FSI.FARM_TYPE AS FARM_TYPE , FSI.FISH_SIZE AS FISH_SIZE , CONCAT(ZONE_CODE, '_', FSI.FISH_CODE) AS NAME_CODE , FSI.MAX_WEIGHT AS MAX_WEIGHT , FSI.MIN_WEIGHT AS MIN_WEIGHT , FSA.ZONE_NAME AS SALE_AREA , FSA.ZONE_CODE AS SALE_AREA_CODE , '0000000000' AS SIZE_CODE FROM FISH_SALE_INFO FSI , FISH_INFO FI , FISH_SALE_AREA FSA WHERE FSI.FISH_INFO_ID = FI.FISH_INFO_ID

SELECT FSA.ZONE_NAME AS SALE_AREA , FMP.PRICE AS PRICE , FSI.FISHERY_AREA AS FISHERY_AREA , FSI.FARM_TYPE AS FARM_TYPE , FSI.FISH_SIZE AS FISH_SIZE , FSI.MIN_WEIGHT AS MIN_WEIGHT , FSI.MAX_WEIGHT AS MAX_WEIGHT , FI.FISH_NAME AS FISH_NAME , FI.YIELD AS YIELD , DATE_FORMAT(FMP.SALE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_DTM FROM FISH_MARKET_PRICE FMP , FISH_SALE_INFO FSI , FISH_SALE_AREA FSA , FISH_INFO FI WHERE FMP.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID = FSI.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID AND FMP.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID = FSA.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID AND DATE(FMP.SALE_DTM) = DATE('2022-06-19') -- AND DATE(FMP.SALE_DTM) = DATE(NOW()) AND FI.FISH_INFO_ID = FSI.FISH_INFO_ID;

SELECT FSA.ZONE_NAME AS SALE_AREA , FMP.PRICE AS PRICE , FSI.FISHERY_AREA AS FISHERY_AREA , FSI.FARM_TYPE AS FARM_TYPE , FSI.FISH_SIZE AS FISH_SIZE , FSI.MIN_WEIGHT AS MIN_WEIGHT , FSI.MAX_WEIGHT AS MAX_WEIGHT , FI.FISH_NAME AS FISH_NAME , FI.YIELD AS YIELD , DATE_FORMAT(FMP.SALE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_DTM FROM FISH_MARKET_PRICE FMP , FISH_SALE_INFO FSI , FISH_SALE_AREA FSA , FISH_INFO FI WHERE FMP.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID = FSI.FISH_SALE_INFO_ID AND FMP.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID = FSA.FISH_SALE_AREA_ID AND DATE(FMP.SALE_DTM) = DATE('2022-06-19') -- AND DATE(FMP.SALE_DTM) = DATE(NOW()) AND FI.FISH_INFO_ID = FSI.FISH_INFO_ID AND FSA.ZONE_NAME = #{saleArea}
SELECT ZONE_NAME AS SALE_AREA FROM FISH_SALE_AREA
